summary: A kabuki actor's mistress hatches a jealous plot to bring down her lover's son.
cast: Takeshi Sakamoto|Chôko Iida|Kôji Mitsui|Emiko Yagumo|Yoshiko Tsubouchi|Tomio Aoki|Reikô Tani|Kiyoshi Aono|Mariko Aoyama|Mitsumura Ikebe|Seiji Nishimura|Mitsuru Wakamiya|Nagamasa Yamada|Munenobu Yui|Chishû Ryû
title: Historia de las hierbas flotantes
